column4: I'm trying to install Ubuntu amd64, and my video card isn't supported with the default drivers.  I want to do the trick that I used on other installs where I edited xorg.conf to vesa, and then installed the updated drivers from Nvidia.
But I can't find that file on the amd64 install.  Any suggestions?
I tried that and it says that xserve-xorg is not installed.  It is just a vanilla install.
